Docs.summary: Provides an interface to allow a composite-control designer to recreate the child controls of its associated control at design time.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A class derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl> implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor> interface to allow its associated designer to call the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor.RecreateChildControls%2A> method at design time. The associated designer must derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner>.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor> interface is used primarily by control developers.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor.RecreateChildControls%2A> method allows a designer for a composite control to recreate the control's child controls at design time.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor.RecreateChildControls%2A> method is used primarily by control developers.
